title: The current state of match making
body:
Hello Everyone,

I just wanted to check other people's experience with 2018 ranking so far, and bring up an issue.

I decided to finally take ranked seriously and advance through to hopefully plat, usually i never play ranked i only got gold so i could be above the rank of my best buddy who is silver.

I decided to make velkoz my main since you have the potential to carry if you play well enough and ive always been a good velkoz player and hes super fun anyways and makes it enjoyable. ( Yes no sustain or peel i know).

But my problem isnt about my champion choice, im starting to find that the ranked system isnt balancing the teams correctly if at all.
Im finding that as a gold 4 im usually the highest on my team in ranking and the enemy team has plat 5 and mostly gold 3 - 2 - 1.

The most recent game i played I had a silver 1 and an unranked and I have the highest ranked player on my team again.
the other team were much much higher ranked then us.

From memory it goes:
Top Gold 3 vs (our) gold 5
Mid gold 2 vs (our) gold 5
Jungler gold 5 vs (our) unranked
adc gold 5 vs (our) silver 1
support gold 3 vs (our) gold 4

Thier yasou mid went 7 - 1 against our ahri, we did win bottom lane i think we left 3 kills up.

When i looked at MMR incase maybe that was the reason my MMR isnt even good, infact its bad, my current MMR is gold 5.
so is there a reason to how unbalanced the system has been currently.
Maybe from being toxic in normals theres some Bad player que that ive been placed into? 
Is the system geared towards cutting off winning streaks or winning average? 
Theres has to be some reasoning behind how consistently the system is unbalanced.

TL:DR, support main complaining about match making.

replies.body: Consider yourself lucky that you were not placed in a match to support an all silver team, that happens a lot when there is a shortage of support mains. Oce matchmaking is always out of whack at the start of a season.
Most likely those higher rank people have shitty mmr too
